Title: Django
Writer: Sergio Corbucci (story), Bruno Corbucci (story), Sergio Corbucci (screenplay), Bruno Corbucci (screenplay), Franco Rossetti (screenplay in collaboration with), Piero Vivarelli (screenplay in collaboration with), Geoffrey Copleston (English version by)
Actors: Franco Nero, José Bódalo, Loredana Nusciak, Ángel Álvarez
Plot: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.
